-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
local UnityEngine = UnityEngine
local UnityEngineUI = UnityEngine.UI
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("UILoginComponentAwakeSystem", function (namespace)
    local Awake
    Awake = function (this, self)
      local rc = self:GetParent(ET.UI).GameObject:GetComponent(ReferenceCollector)
      self.loginBtn = rc:Get("LoginBtn", UnityEngine.GameObject)
      self.loginBtn:GetComponent(UnityEngineUI.Button):getonClick():AddListener(System.fn(self, self.OnLogin))
      self.account = rc:Get("Account", UnityEngine.GameObject)
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.AwakeSystem_1(out.ET.UILoginComponent)
        }
      end,
      Awake = Awake
    }
  end)

  namespace.class("UILoginComponentSystem", function (namespace)
    local OnLogin
    OnLogin = function (self)
      ET.LoginHelper.Login(ET.SceneHelper.DomainScene(self), "127.0.0.1:10002", self.account:GetComponent(UnityEngineUI.InputField):gettext()):Coroutine()
    end
    return {
      OnLogin = OnLogin
    }
  end)
end)
